content: The URL used for the single logout on the Service provider side

comment.text: This translation key is used to display the URL label for a single logout endpoint on the Service provider side in a dropdown menu or button. The text appears in a tooltip that explains the purpose of this setting in the Portal Settings page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'عنوان URL المستخدم لتسجيل الخروج الفردي من جانب مزود الخدمة' is a literal translation but could be more natural and concise in Arabic. 'مزود الخدمة' is correct, but the overall phrasing is slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: عنوان URL لتسجيل الخروج الموحد من جهة مزود الخدمة

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Xidmət təminatçısı tərəfindən birdəfəlik çıxış üçün istifadə edilən URL' is a literal translation and lacks the nuance of the English 'The URL used for the single logout on the Service provider side'. A more natural-sounding translation would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Xidmət təminatçısı tərəfindən sinxron çıxış üçün istifadə olunan URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'отписване' could be more accurately translated as 'излизане'. 'Отписване' implies deregistration rather than simply logging out.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL адресът, използван за единично излизане от страна на доставчика на услуги

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Service provider' is better translated as 'Dienstanbieter' instead of 'auf Seiten des Dienstanbieters'. The latter implies 'on the side of the service provider', which is not the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Die URL, die für die einmalige Abmeldung beim Dienstanbieter verwendet wird

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Kertakirjautumisessa käytetty URL palveluntarjoajan puolella' is a literal translation but doesn't convey the intended meaning as clearly as it could. 'Single logout' is better translated as 'Yhden kirjautumisen lopettaminen'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Yhden kirjautumisen lopettamisessa käytetty URL palveluntarjoajan puolella

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'palveluntarjoajan puolella' is technically correct, a more natural phrasing might be preferred.

The Armenian translation is a literal translation and doesn't quite capture the intended meaning. 'Single logout' is a specific technical term. A more accurate translation would convey that it's a URL specifically for single logout functionality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-ը, որն օգտագործվում է ծառայությունների մատակարարի կողմից սինգլ լոգաութ գործառույթի համար

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the Armenian sentence is a bit long and reads awkwardly. Consider restructuring for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ծառայությունների մատակարարի կողմից սինգլ լոգաութի համար օգտագործվող URL-ը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຜູ້ໃຫ້ບໍລິການ' is technically correct but could be more naturally translated as 'ຜູ້ສະໜອງບໍລິການ' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຜູ້ສະໜອງບໍລິການ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Vienotās atteikšanās vietrādis URL pakalpojuma sniedzēja pusē" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "The URL used for the single logout on the Service provider side". 'Vietrādis' refers to a specific type of steering apparatus, and isn't appropriate in this context. Also, the structure is a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be something like "Atteikšanās no vienotās autentifikācijas URL pakalpojuma sniedzēja pusē" or "Vienotās izejas URL pakalpojuma sniedzēja pusē".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'O URL utilizado para o término de sessão único do lado do Fornecedor do serviço' is a bit literal and could be more natural. 'Fornecedor do serviço' is accurate but sounds somewhat formal. A more common phrasing would use 'provedor de serviço'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O URL utilizado para o término de sessão único do lado do provedor de serviço

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'término de sessão' is technically correct, 'encerramento de sessão' or simply 'logout' are more commonly used and sound more natural in a technical context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O URL utilizado para o encerramento de sessão único do lado do provedor de serviço

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'සේවා ප්‍රතිපාදකයාගේ පස තනි නික්මීම සඳහා මෙම ඒ.ස.නි. භාවිතා කරයි' is not an accurate representation of 'The URL used for the single logout on the Service provider side'. The phrasing is awkward and doesn't convey the meaning clearly. 'පස' (pasa) means 'side' but in this context it's not the correct usage.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation would be something like: 'සේවා සැපයුම්කරුගේ ඒකතනි ලඝ්‍රාබාසයෙන් පිටවීම සඳහා භාවිතා වන URL මෙයයි' (This is the URL used for single logout from the Service Provider).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the use of 'ඒ.ස.නි.' (A.S.N.) could be confusing to Sinhala speakers who may not be familiar with the English abbreviation. It would be better to use the full Sinhala equivalent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'ඒ.ස.නි.' with its full Sinhala translation if one exists and is commonly understood. If not, simplifying the wording is preferable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit convoluted. It could be restructured for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Reorganizing the sentence to prioritize clarity and flow, such as placing the action (URL usage) earlier in the sentence, would improve comprehension.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Service provider side' isn't accurately reflected in the Slovenian translation. 'Ponudnika storitev' is correct, but it's a literal translation that lacks the implied context of the side or endpoint.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL, uporabljen za enkratno odjavo pri ponudniku storitev.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL који се користи за једнострано одјављивање на страни пружаоца услуга' isn't the most natural or precise translation. 'Jeднострано одјављивање' could be improved. 'Single logout' implies a coordinated process, and the Serbian translation doesn't quite capture that nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL који се користи за координисано одјављивање на страни пружаоца услуга

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'страни' is not the most accurate term for 'side' in this context. 'Страни' usually refers to 'sides' of something, not a provider.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL који се користи за координисано одјављивање на сајту пружаоца услуга

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'đăng xuất một lần' (single logout) is overly literal and may not be the most natural way to express this in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing would be 'đăng xuất duy nhất'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL được sử dụng cho đăng xuất duy nhất ở phía Nhà cung cấp dịch vụ
